name: Ximedica
overview: Ximedica, LLC provides integrated research, development, regulatory, and manufacturing services to medical device makers, consumer healthcare companies, and healthcare providers. Its research and strategy services include commercial landscape assessment and product strategy, market segmentation studies, voice of the customer research, contextual user research, in-use design optimization studies, concept testing, and clinical trial design and execution services. The company’s human factors industrial design services comprise concept generation, human factors and ergonomics, industrial, engineering, interface, and packaging design service, as well as rapid prototyping, anthropometrics, and user testing services. Its engineering services include mechanical and electrical engineering development, software engineering and system architecture, design for manufacture and assembly, tool development, quality engineering, design verification, design for six sigma, FMEA, finite element analysis, mold flow analysis, and tolerance analysis services. The company also provides clinical and regulatory services. In addition, it offers medical device development and manufacturing services for general surgery, endoscopy, laparoscopy, NOTES, cardiology, emergency medicine, orthopedics, wound management, diagnostic imaging, respiratory therapy, drug delivery systems, urology, gynecology, oncology, and neurology categories, as well as personal care, home diagnostics, first aid, pain management, post-operative care, diabetes management, oral care, hearing aids, durable medical equipment, and feminine hygiene categories. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Providence, Rhode Island with a satellite office in Hong Kong.
